flow like it's tokyo

There's a different kind of Karaoke happening in Seattle. Eleven private Japanese-style Karaoke box rooms. A full bar. You and your friends, rocking the box your way.

BOOK A BOX

DRINK. SNACK. SING. REPEAT.

Snacks and drinks are traditional at Karaoke boxes in Japan. Enjoy seasonal cocktails. And order charcuterie + cheese from our neighbor Cure.

SEE OUR MENU

plan a catered event

Need to rock a bigger crowd? Bring it! In addition to our 15-person Karaoke boxes, we've got a fully decked-out party room that can handle 35+ people—perfect for special nights and lots of singers. Aww, it's even got a little stage. Our catering menu and bar packages are available for large parties too.

TEAM BUILDING • PRODUCT LAUNCH CELEBRATIONS• BIRTHDAY PARTIES • ANNIVERSARIES • BACHELORETTE PARTIES • GOING AWAY PARTIES • JUST FOR THE HECK OF IT

PLAN AN EVENT

check out our songs

You don't have to be a Karaoke veteran to rock the mic. We have thousands of tracks in more than a dozen languages, including all the faves. Find yours now or in the box!

SEE OUR SONG LIST

hours

Rock Box is open all week, with a super terrific happy hour every day. You can even book an after-hours Karaoke room Thursday through Saturday, though the bar closes promptly at 2 am. Small sad face.

Day Hours Happy Hour
MON-WED 4PM-2AM 4PM-8PM
THURS 4PM-3AM 4PM-8PM
FRI-SAT 3PM-4AM 3PM-7PM
SUN 3PM-2AM ADD DAY!
